column4: I wanted to run my old games but I have giving up on vmware to much trouble
dosbox is good but why is vmware too much trouble?
I just got fed up with it slowing down my pc and I was using a pc with a P4 processor in it
have you tried qemu or virtual box instad of vmware?
and wine is good too
qemu I have used before it's good never used virtualbox
hmm btw curious why was flash player install a pain?
well took me awhile to find the right info I needed and where to put it
yes sometimes it happens that some tutorials have really outdated info, that confuses things a lot
now only symlink to home or system browser profile and works fine, so easy :)
yeah but I was able to get flash working so I am happy
did they ever got shockwave working?
with crossover yes
natively no
well I got flash running native but not shockwave
that is because there is no native version of shockwave for linux
unfortunly
that is really easy also in linux make and make install :)
of course if you do not have Makefile then it is more complicated
well usually make install is common but sometime I don't want it installed
yes
just compiled and then I chmod it with +x
you could also run or bash it
true sometimes I don't want terminal to work in the background
